Ich bin leidenschaftliche Full-Stack-Ent: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer from Dresden. For me coding is fascinating because it never stagnates. If you want to keep pace as an programmer you have to develop together. That's why it's not enough for me to program software. I want to operate it safely. Because of that I educate myself currently in the field of DevSecOps to gain expertise in IT Security and Cloud Engineering.
Für mich hat es einen großen Reiz beim P: For me it has an appeal that coding means to combine analytical thinking and creativity. From an empty space you create a tangible world with letters and numbers.
